html.p: The below are areas of Splunk checks that will help you with your Splunk Admin work.
These panels will assit you with various checks on the health of the Splunk Platform.
It does not replace the MC, but this should be used where you do not have the MC installed or need to run some quick checks.
This app is designed for Splunk admins only as access to various internal indexes and REST/api calls.
Configure the macros as per your environment, see the panel 'Macros Check' for config.
Install the apps required - see panel on App Install and Config, these will show up on the App Install check Panel.
